pullrequest.title: Create SRC rounds with keys and appropriate permissions

content.raw:
I checked and all that's available at `public` here are the machine resource ids:

~~~
{
  "simulator_id": "simulator-2090",
  "fieldcomputer_id": "simulator-2091"
}
~~~

I also checked that the competitor can't use these ids to get the simulators using the `GET /simulators/<id>` route. Not super important, but I think we could move those ids to the secure data.
content.html:
I checked and all that's available at public here are the machine resource ids:

{
  "simulator_id": "simulator-2090",
  "fieldcomputer_id": "simulator-2091"
}

I also checked that the competitor can't use these ids to get the simulators using the GET /simulators/<id> route. Not super important, but I think we could move those ids to the secure data.
